Title: Requires certain public schools to offer Halal food options and Kosher food options during lunch
Summary: Requires schools that have a Muslim or Jewish population greater than or equal to ten percent of the student body to offer Halal food options and/or Kosher food options during lunch.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain public schools to offer Halal food options and Kosher food options during lunch
